alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Livingston; Monroe; Oakland; Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 9:50AM EDT until March 30 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations less than one inch and ice accumulations around one tenth an inch. * WHERE...Livingston, Washtenaw, Lenawee, Monroe, Oakland and Wayne Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and sleet develops late in the evening and quickly changes over to freezing rain tonight. Temperatures will then creep above the freezing mark between 6-10 AM Wednesday morning supporting rain or drizzle.
info.instruction: Untreated road and walking surfaces are expected to become slick and hazardous. Extra caution and slower travel will likely be needed during the morning commute.

area.areaDesc: Lenawee; Livingston; Monroe; Oakland; Washtenaw; Wayne
